amendment.description: To authorize appropriations for fiscal years 2014 through 2017 for the Trafficking Victims Protection Act of 2000, to enhance measures to combat trafficking in persons, and for other purposes.

vote.text: Amendment SA 21 as modified agreed to in Senate by Yea-Nay Vote. 93 - 5. Record Vote Number: 15.

action.text: Amendment SA 21 proposed by Senator Leahy.
